attributes.action: Get DWP to pay and explain the letter that is on my Twitter profile!
attributes.background:
RN service pension of £56.00 has been changed to read £147.34 NHS this totally false!   20 years in Royal Navy !  LSGC Medal.    Queens Goldern Jubilee Medal from Prison Service. 
Check my Bank account?
No they did not, check with pension service either but The Fraud and investigation

rejection.details:
If you would like to make a complaint about the way the DWP has acted, you can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions/about/complaints-procedure
